page.title: 04CUMBERNAULD, SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: THE SPORTS CENTRE FOR CUMBERNAULD IS CALLED THE TRYST(MEETING PLACE) AND IT WAS BUILT IN TWO STAGES. THE POOL IN JANUARY 1973 AND THE DRY SPORTS FACILITIES IN APRIL 1975 (OPENING). THE POOL IS THE FACILITY MOST USED, 350000 VISITORS EACH YEAR.56 PEOPLE WORK AT THE TRYST.THE TRYST HAS PRODUCED SEVERAL FAMOUS SPORTSMEN AND WOMEN. HANDICAPPED PEOPLE HAVE A SWIMMING CLUB IN THE CENTRE. THE MANAGER, MR.GRACIE, TOLD US THAT IT COSTS CUMBERNAULD AND KILSYTH DISTRICT RATE PAYERS Â£500000 PER YEAR TO RUN THE TRYST.
